{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_FireSTGrenade}} '''A_FireSTGrenade'''[(string ''missiletype'')] {{deprecated}}
Fires a projectile (a {{Class|Grenade}} by default) at a slight upward angle compared to the player's view. The following two lines are equivalent:
GRLG B 12 '''A_FireSTGrenade''' GRLG B 12 [[A_FireProjectile]] ("{{Class|Grenade}}", 0, true, 0, 0, 0, -6.328125)
While A_FireSTGrenade can be used with other projectiles, it is advised to instead use [[A_FireProjectile]] with the pitch parameter.
[[category:Decorate Weapon attack functions|FireSTGrenade]]
